item.title: Alex's Adventures in Academia-land
item.description: Intro While I usually use this blog to work on casual pet projects, I wanted to take an opportunity to use the medium to discuss academic research. Writing is an instinctive mechanism for me to process my thoughts on a topic, but it is one that I use sparingly to discuss the meta-narrative of my own decisions and behavior. The impetus for this self-reflection is the following exciting news: Iâ€™ll be pursuing my PhD in economics at Harvard starting this fall!
